name: Spirit of the Perfected Mace
description: Salvaged from the Perfected Mace. Used to craft The Energizer.

name: Mini Mister Mittens
description:
Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.
Combine 3 of this miniature with a pile of crystalline dust, an obsidian shard, and an azure denaturizing agent (dropped by creatures in scale 21–50 fractals) in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Baron von Scrufflebutt.

name: Recipe: Maklain's Striders
description: A recipe to make ascended medium boots with Minstrel's (+Toughness, +Healing, +Concentration, and +Vitality) stats.

name: Crystal Arbiter Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Blue Color Study

name: Aquatic Ruin Challenge Mote
description:
Complete the Aquatic Ruins Challenge in the casual tier (scale 1–20)! Beat the Jellyfish Beast with an 80% reduction to all healing!
To activate challenge mode, speak with the challenge mote near the beginning of the fractal. A party vote is required to activate.
